item.title: Why Does My Parakeet Have Diarrhea? (Vet Answers)
item.description: Parakeets are small, colorful birds that can be wonderful pets. They can be a little more high-maintenance than most other pets but the rewards they provide make it worth it.

item.title: Why Does My Parakeet Eat His Poop? (Vet Answers)
item.description: Parakeets are intelligent birds that need to be stimulated in order to be happy.

item.title: How Big Do Corgis Get? (Vet Answers)
item.description: I love Corgis. They are the cutest creatures in the world.

item.title: Why Is My Parakeet Clicking Its Beak?
item.description: Our winged pet is capable of making different types of sounds with its beak.

item.title: When Do Blue Heeler Puppies Need Their First Haircut?
item.description: Blue Heeler puppies are very cute and have a very distinctive appearance.

item.title: Why Do Parakeets Stand On One Foot?
item.description: Parakeets are very sociable animals. They love to interact with their owners.
